CustomField.description: **CAUTION - USED IN INTEGRATIONS** A communication line is a feature that can be booked with premium level calls only. This line enables the chairperson to speak with an operator during pre-conference through the entire duration of the call. This line could be used for troubleshooting and or Q&A manipulation.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select "Yes" if a Communication Line has been requested.
CustomField.label: Comm Line
